body: An eidolon's sense of smell becomes even more acute. The eidolon can notice other creatures by scent in a 180-foot radius underwater and can detect blood in the water at ranges of up to a mile. The eidolon must possess the gills and scent evolutions to take this evolution.
name: Keen Scent
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Evolutions/2-Point Evolutions/Keen Scent
